member.name: MFNetCredentialOptions
member.summary: Describes options for the caching network credentials.

member.name: MFNetCredentialOptions.MFNET_CREDENTIAL_SAVE
member.summary: Allow the credential cache object to save credentials in persistent storage.

member.name: MFNetCredentialOptions.MFNET_CREDENTIAL_DONT_CACHE
member.summary: Do not allow the credential cache object to cache the credentials in memory. This flag cannot be combined with the MFNET_CREDENTIAL_SAVE flag.

summary.para: The user allows credentials to be sent over the network in clear text.

By default, always returns the REQUIRE_PROMPT flag when the authentication flags include MFNET_AUTHENTICATION_CLEAR_TEXT, even if cached credentials are available. If you set the MFNET_CREDENTIAL_ALLOW_CLEAR_TEXT option, the GetCredential method will not return REQUIRE_PROMPT for clear text, if cached credentials are available.
Do not set this flag without notifying the user that credentials might be sent in clear text.
